title: The real reason Sword of the Divine got deleted.

replies.body: No one bought it, it had no real purpose lol.
Sword of the Divine had no real place since dodge was removed...

Same with the old, old sword of divine, back when everyone basically bought it. It's just too borderline op, then when they balance it no one buys it anymore.

By the way didn't Atma convert % health into AD not armour? I'm not sure but I used to go Atmas + Warmogs alot back in the day.

Atma's Impaler was bought quite a bit until they nerfed the percentage of health that got converted into amour. 
After that it fell off.
He is an ap bruiser though I'm fairly sure.
